Name: Top Secret
About the game: You awake to the sound of bubbles. Visions flash before your eyes. You know that it is your destiny to free a world unaware of its own oppression. But first, you must escape. Top Secret is an intense 10 minute interactive VR narrative. It combines situational problem-solving with action-based gameplay. Have you ever wanted to have psychic powers like telekinesis? Now you can! Both comfort and traditional FPS movement options available.
